nodes.text: An e-nursery retail website that integrates clustering-based recommendation and visual data representation will enhance user experience and optimize business operations for plant nurseries and customers
Clustering algorithms can group users with similar preferences and behaviors to enable personalized product recommendations
Visual data representation (dashboards, charts) provides intuitive insights into sales trends, customer demographics, and product popularity to support decision making
A web-based e-nursery platform with product catalog, shopping cart, secure payments, and account management bridges the gap between traditional nurseries and online shoppers
The project implements machine learning clustering (examples: K-means, hierarchical) as the recommendation engine and uses Tableau and Matplotlib for visualization
Data preparation steps include collecting plant database, customer registration data, purchase and search history, and cleaning these data for clustering
Based on cluster membership, the system suggests products aligned with users interests and prior purchases (personalized recommendation workflow)
Integration of Tableau and Matplotlib to create interactive dashboards and graphical outputs allows stakeholders to explore data via filters and drill-downs
Implemented website modules include login, registration, home page, product pages, add-to-cart, checkout, secure payment gateway, and payment receipt generation
System outputs demonstrated include GUI screenshots and a personalized recommendation example where adding Piper Betel Maghal produced an Aloe vera recommendation
Prior literature supports the use of K-means and hybrid clustering approaches to improve recommendation accuracy and address cold-start and sparsity issues in e-commerce
Combining clustering-based recommendations with visual analytics can empower administrators for inventory management, marketing strategies, and improved communication with stakeholders
The implemented e-nursery prototype demonstrates feasibility of the approach and suggests potential to enhance shopping experience, increase engagement, and improve business efficiency
